# Python Narrative packages
- [politicsnlp](https://pypi.org/project/politicsnlp/) for Politics
- [religionnlp](https://pypi.org/project/religionnlp/) for Religion
- [lawnlp](https://pypi.org/project/lawnlp/) for Law
- [economynlp](https://pypi.org/project/economynlp/) for Economy
- [cpanlp](https://pypi.org/project/cpanlp/) for Business
- [militarynlp](https://pypi.org/project/militarynlp/) for Military

For detailed installation instructions, see the
[documentation](https://cpanlp.com/documentation).

```python
pip install politicsnlp
import politicsnlp as poli
```


## Module:
|  Module   | Content  |
|  :----:  | :----:  |
| **Core**  | `Democracy`Ôºå`Freedom`Ôºå`Justice`Ôºå`Spirit Of The Law`Ôºå`Natural Rights`Ôºå`Separation Of Powers`|
| **Form Of Government**  | `Aristocracy`Ôºå`Autocracy`Ôºå`Colonialism`Ôºå`Communism`Ôºå`Direct Democracy`Ôºå`Monarchy`Ôºå`Oligarchy`Ôºå`Representative Democracy`Ôºå`Socialism`Ôºå`Theocracy`|
| **Ideology**  | `Confucianism`Ôºå`Nationalism`|
| **Individual**  | `Civil Servant`Ôºå`Monarch`Ôºå`Strongman`Ôºå`Tyrant`|
| **Institutions**  | `Administration`Ôºå`Judiciary`Ôºå`Legislature`|
| **Marxism**  | `Marxism`Ôºå`Mao Zedong Thought`Ôºå`Deng Xiaoping Theory`Ôºå`Xi Jinping Thought`|
| **Party**  | `Conservative Party`Ôºå`CCP`Ôºå`UKIP`|
| **Stance**  | `Hawk`Ôºå`Leftist`Ôºå`Rightist`Ôºå`Neutral`|




Check out: https://cpanlp.com
